title: Font search
content:
I need help finding the name of the font (see attached)  
Any help would be appreciated!!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hydraulic sales, service and repairs.PNG](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020190900/http:/typophile.com/files/hydraulic%20sales,%20service%20and%20repairs.PNG) | 13 KB |
author: core1

comments.content: Segoe Print is the font with italic font enabled to give it that side ways look.
